description:
â€œGrammar Essentials Jumpstart" reviews critical yet under practiced guidelines of Standard English grammar. Learn the grammar rules you absolutely need to know to immediately improve your writing. Each lesson includes plenty of grammar exercises and grammar quizzes to assess your knowledge and track your progress.

This online grammar class covers the most common grammar topics:

  • Grammar Terms Review (Parts of Speech)
  • Prepositional Phrases
  • Fragments
  • Run-ons
  • Subject/Verb Agreement
  • Final Grammar Test
title: Grammar Essentials
